Creates a new collaboration space owned by the client the user is authenticated against

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

>

  parameters={undefined}

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"The space to be created","required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string"},"category":{"type":"string"}},"title":"AbstractCollaborationSpace"},{"type":"object","properties":{"collaborators":{"type":"array","items":{"description":"CollaboratorCreate","allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Abstract Collaborator","properties":{"clientId":{"type":"string"},"name":{"type":"string","description":"A name given the collaborator. This value is intended to be read by humans.","example":"My Collaborator"},"label":{"type":"string","description":"A label given the collaborator. This value is intended to refered to in code.","example":"my-collaborator"},"configuration":{"description":"A configuration of the collaborator. This is an object representing key-value pairs that will be available in the cage as environment variables.","type":"object","additionalProperties":true}},"discriminator":{"propertyName":"role","mapping":{"CodeProvider":{"type":"object","x-ogen-name":"CodeProvider","description":"Someone who provides code","properties":{"role":{"type":"string","example":"CodeProvider"},"settings":{"type":"object","properties":{"description":{"type":"string"}}},"source":{"type":"object","required":["registry","image","tag"],"properties":{"registry":{"type":"string"},"image":{"type":"string"},"tag":{"type":"string"},"secret":{"type":"string","description":"A value that will be interpreted as an ImagePullSecret. An example would be a github access token that has at least the scope `packages:read`, base64 encoded as `username:token`. If no value is provided no ImagePullSecret will be used when deploying the cage."}}}},"title":"CollaboratorRoleCodeProvider"},"DataProvider":{"type":"object","x-ogen-name":"DataProvider","description":"Someone who provides Data","properties":{"role":{"type":"string","example":"DataProvider"},"settings":{"type":"object","properties":{"description":{"type":"string"}}}},"title":"CollaboratorRoleDataProvider"},"DataConsumer":{"type":"object","x-ogen-name":"DataConsumer","description":"Someone who consumes data","properties":{"role":{"type":"string","example":"DataConsumer"},"settings":{"type":"object","properties":{"description":{"type":"string"}}}},"title":"CollaboratorRoleDataConsumer"}}},"oneOf":[{"type":"object","x-ogen-name":"CodeProvider","description":"Someone who provides code","properties":{"role":{"type":"string","example":"CodeProvider"},"settings":{"type":"object","properties":{"description":{"type":"string"}}},"source":{"type":"object","required":["registry","image","tag"],"properties":{"registry":{"type":"string"},"image":{"type":"string"},"tag":{"type":"string"},"secret":{"type":"string","description":"A value that will be interpreted as an ImagePullSecret. An example would be a github access token that has at least the scope `packages:read`, base64 encoded as `username:token`. If no value is provided no ImagePullSecret will be used when deploying the cage."}}}},"title":"CollaboratorRoleCodeProvider"},{"type":"object","x-ogen-name":"DataProvider","description":"Someone who provides Data","properties":{"role":{"type":"string","example":"DataProvider"},"settings":{"type":"object","properties":{"description":{"type":"string"}}}},"title":"CollaboratorRoleDataProvider"},{"type":"object","x-ogen-name":"DataConsumer","description":"Someone who consumes data","properties":{"role":{"type":"string","example":"DataConsumer"},"settings":{"type":"object","properties":{"description":{"type":"string"}}}},"title":"CollaboratorRoleDataConsumer"}],"title":"AbstractCollaborator"},{"type":"object","required":["clientId"]}],"title":"CollaboratorCreate"}}},"required":["name"]}],"title":"CollaborationSpaceCreate"}}}}}
>
